src:
KK Crvena zvezda: Na Real za 500 dinara
02 Nov 2019, 11:37 by Milos
Crvena zvezda će u okviru sedmog kola Evrolige dočekati Real Madrid.
Utakmica u „Štark Areni“ na programu je u četvrtak, 7. novembra od 19 časova.
Crveno-beli će u ponedeljak, 4. novembra pustiti u slobodnu prodaju pojedinačne ulaznice za susret sa kraljevskim klubom. Karte se mogu kupiti u svim poslovnicama „Tikets-a“, a cena najjeftinijih iznosi 500 dinara.
Opširnije možete pročitati ovde.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
BC Red Star: At Real for 500 dinars
02 Nov 2019, 11:37 by Milos
The Red Star will face Real Madrid as part of the Euroleague Round seven.
The match at the Stark Arena on the program is Thursday, November 7 from 7pm.
The Red and White will release the single ticket to meet the Royal Club on Monday, November 4th. Tickets can be purchased at all Tikets outlets and the cheapest price is 500 dinars.
You can read more here.
